qas.question: Where does the Glastonbury Music festival take place

answers.text: takes place most years in Pilton, near Shepton Mallet

qas.question: who holds a literature festival each summer

answers.text: The annual Bath Literature Festival is one of several local festivals in the county

qas.question: The annual Carnival is held when and where

answers.text: The annual circuit of West Country Carnivals is held in a variety of Somerset towns during the autumn

qas.question: How many people attend the Bath Literature Festival each year?
How many people live in Pilton?

plausible_answers.text: The Glastonbury Festival of Contemporary Performing Arts

qas.question: What is the largest annual music festival in Europe?
What Festival is held in Trowbridge?
How many people attend the Festival of Lights each year?

context: <b5_0>The Glastonbury Festival of Contemporary Performing Arts<b5_0/> <a0_0>takes place most years in Pilton, near Shepton Mallet<a0_0/>, attracting over <b3_0><b4_0><b7_0>170,000<b7_0/><b4_0/><b3_0/> music and culture lovers from around the world to see world-famous entertainers. The Big Green Gathering which grew out of the Green fields at the Glastonbury Festival is held in the Mendip Hills between Charterhouse and Compton Martin each summer. <a1_0>The annual Bath Literature Festival is one of several local festivals in the county<a1_0/>; others include the Frome Festival and the Trowbridge <b6_0>Village Pump Festival<b6_0/>, which, despite its name, is held at Farleigh Hungerford in Somerset. <a2_0>The annual circuit of West Country Carnivals is held in a variety of Somerset towns during the autumn<a2_0/>, forming a major regional festival, and the largest Festival of Lights in Europe.
